title: Tom.Clancy's.Ghost.Recon.Future.Soldier.Repack-R.G.Games
description:
Tom.Clancy's.Ghost.Recon.Future.Soldier.Repack-R.G.Games

Year: 2012 
Genre: Action, Shooter, 3D, 1st, Person 
Language: Russian, English 
Language: Russian, English 
Version: v.1.8.130422 
Publication Type: Repack 
Crack: enclosing (SKiDROW)

System requirements: 

Operating System: Windows  Vista / Windows  7 / Windows  8 
Processor: Pentium D 3 GHz / Athlon 64 X2 4400 + 
RAM: 2 GB of memory 
Video card: GeForce 8600 GTS / Radeon HD 4650 
Sound card: compatible with DirectX  
Hard disk space: 14.9 GB

Description: 

Ghost Recon: Future Soldier promises to go beyond a series of war games 
Ghost Recon and present us with completely new gameplay. The game offers 
cutting-edge technology, prototype high-tech weapons, modern single-player 
and multiplayer modes. 

"Ghosts", consisting of elite fighters of special forces, ready to complete 
the task at any point on the globe. Their work - the fight against terrorism, 
the neutralization of enemy agents and destruction by superior enemy forces.
Over time, this legendary squad ceased to be just one of the special forces 
units and turned into an ideal tool that can change the fate of mankind. 
Equipped with the latest technology, equipped with the best development of 
military technology, these experts will make you company in a number of 
specific military operations. You are waiting for the hot sands of 
Africa and Antarctic ice, penetration of the secretive missions and 
battle for survival. In the role of one of the men you have to fight 
side by side with the best squad operatives. It's time to show what 
they are capable of true professionals!

DLC

Deluxe Edition
Arctic Strike
Raven Strike
Khyber Strike

Features RePack
Remove all localization, other than those Recoded (lossless) 
DLCs included 
Choose the installation (text + voice) 
Game Version 1.8.130422 
Divided into 3 DVD 5 (Readme.txt folder distribution) 
Installation of additional software (optional) 
Repack By R G Games
